_header: There I love there lack I not
_description: Adaptation of a Latin proverb Ubi amor, ibi oculus — one couplet

DurCathBI18.Transcription:
Þere I louie þere leik i nouthÞer is myn hert
                    þere is my thouth
DurCathBI18.Note:
In Latin prose Summa de vii viciis of Thomas
                    Aquinas.
